Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Baltimore in 2005...
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Baltimore in 2005...
Had first career hit on 4/8/2008, off Ben Ford (SEA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/2008, off Matt Garza (TB)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 2008, hitting .268 with 19 HR, 78 RBI...
Injured on 7/1/2009 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/28/2011 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for full season...
Drove in 6 runs against Cleveland on 9/26/2012...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/2013, hitting .417 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 2013 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against Texas on 8/2/2015...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Oakland on 8/29/2017...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 9 RBI against Minnesota on 8/29/2018...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/15/2019 with a Broken Foot, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/24/2021 to a 4-year deal worth $2,560,000 per year...
Injured on 5/13/2021 with a Strained Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 7 weeks...
Had 2000th career hit on 7/31/2021, off Jhoulys Chacin (WSH)...
Traded from Houston to Colorado on 7/31/2022 (Going to COL: RF J. Upton, P N. Villar. Going to HOU: SS J. Baez, LF J. Moore Jr.)...
